alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 10:12AM MST until February 23 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Chinle, Dilkon, Holbrook, Kayenta, Kykotsmovi, Snowflake-Taylor and Winslow. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 11 PM Today: Chinle 1 to 3 inches Dilkon 2 to 4 inches Holbrook 0 to 1 inches Kayenta 1 to 2 inches Kykotsmovi 1 to 3 inches Snowflake-Taylr 0 to 1 inches Winslow 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
